channel.title: Foo on Adam Israel
channel.description: Recent content in Foo on Adam Israel

item.title: Configuring charm repositories via install_sources
item.description:
juju set cassandra authenticator=AllowAllAuthenticator install_sources=“- deb http://www.apache.org/dist/cassandra/debian 21x main - ppa:openjdk-r/ppa - ppa:stub/cassandra” install_keys=“- F758CE318D77295D”

juju set cassandra authenticator=AllowAllAuthenticator install_sources=”[‘deb http://www.apache.org/dist/cassandra/debian 21x main’, ‘ppa:openjdk-r/ppa’, ‘ppa:stub/cassandra’]” install_keys=”[F758CE318D77295D, null, null]”
